faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.introduction: Find answers to the most common questions about ScanPro. Tap on a category to see related questions and tap on a question to view the answer.
faq.contact_support: If you can't find the answer to your question here, please contact our support team.

what_is_scanpro.question: What is ScanPro?
what_is_scanpro.answer: ScanPro is a powerful document scanning application that allows you to convert physical documents, receipts, ID cards, and photos into high-quality digital files. With advanced features like PDF compression, OCR text recognition, and cloud backup options, ScanPro helps you organize and manage all your important documents in one place.

platforms.question: Which platforms is ScanPro available on?
platforms.answer: ScanPro is currently available for iOS and Android devices. We're continuously working on expanding to other platforms.

free_to_use.question: Is ScanPro free to use?
free_to_use.answer: ScanPro offers both free and premium features. Basic scanning and document management is available for free, while advanced features like cloud backup, OCR, and batch processing may require a premium subscription.

how_to_scan.question: How do I scan a document?
how_to_scan.answer:
To scan a document:
1. Open ScanPro and tap the "Scan" button on the home screen
2. Position your camera over the document
3. The app will automatically detect edges and capture the image
4. You can then crop, adjust, and enhance the scan before saving

scan_types.question: What types of documents can I scan?
scan_types.answer:
ScanPro can scan various documents including:
- Regular paper documents
- Receipts
- ID cards and passports
- Photos
- Business cards
- Whiteboards
- Books and magazines

organize_documents.question: How do I organize my scanned documents?
organize_documents.answer:
ScanPro offers a folder system to help you organize documents. You can:
- Create custom folders with different colors and icons
- Move documents between folders
- Add tags to documents for easy searching
- Mark important documents as favorites

edit_documents.question: Can I edit documents after scanning?
edit_documents.answer:
Yes, ScanPro offers various editing tools:
- Crop and rotate pages
- Enhance text and image quality
- Add or remove pages
- Reorder pages in multi-page documents
- Add text notes and annotations

multiple_pages.question: How do I scan multiple pages into a single document?
multiple_pages.answer:
When in scanning mode:
1. Capture the first page
2. Tap "Add Page" to scan additional pages
3. Continue adding pages as needed
4. Once finished, tap "Save" to create a multi-page document

file_formats.question: What file formats does ScanPro support?
file_formats.answer: ScanPro primarily saves documents as PDF files for maximum compatibility. You can also export scans as JPEG or PNG images if needed.

share_documents.question: How do I share documents from ScanPro?
share_documents.answer:
You can share documents by:
1. Opening the document you want to share
2. Tapping the share icon in the toolbar
3. Selecting your preferred sharing method (email, messaging apps, cloud services)

password_protection.question: Can I password-protect my documents?
password_protection.answer: Yes, ScanPro allows you to add password protection to sensitive PDF documents. Just open the document, tap the menu button, and select "Add Password."

compress_pdf.question: How do I compress PDF files?
compress_pdf.answer:
To compress a PDF:
1. Open the document you want to compress
2. Tap the menu button and select "Compress PDF"
3. Choose your desired compression level (low, medium, high, or maximum)
4. The app will create a compressed copy of your document

backup_documents.question: How do I back up my documents?
backup_documents.answer:
ScanPro offers several backup options:
- Local device backup
- Google Drive backup

To create a backup:
1. Go to Settings > Backup & Restore
2. Select your preferred backup destination
3. Tap "Create Backup"

backup_frequency.question: How often should I back up my documents?
backup_frequency.answer: We recommend setting up automatic backups on a regular schedule (daily, weekly, or monthly) to ensure your documents are always protected.

restore_documents.question: How do I restore my documents from a backup?
restore_documents.answer:
To restore from a backup:
1. Go to Settings > Backup & Restore
2. Switch to the "Restore" tab
3. Select your backup source
4. Choose the backup you want to restore
5. Confirm the restoration process

ocr.question: What is OCR and how do I use it?
ocr.answer:
OCR (Optical Character Recognition) is a feature that extracts text from scanned images, making the text searchable and editable. To use OCR:
1. Enable OCR in the scan settings before scanning a document
2. Alternatively, open an existing document, tap the menu button, and select "Extract Text"

merge_pdfs.question: Can I merge multiple PDF documents?
merge_pdfs.answer:
Yes, ScanPro allows you to merge multiple PDFs:
1. Go to the Tools section and select "Merge PDFs"
2. Select the documents you want to combine
3. Arrange them in your preferred order
4. Tap "Merge" to create a new combined document

edge_detection.question: The app isn't detecting document edges properly. What should I do?
edge_detection.answer:
For better edge detection:
- Ensure good lighting conditions
- Place the document against a contrasting background
- Keep the camera steady and parallel to the document
- Try switching to manual mode if automatic detection fails

blurry_text.question: My scanned text is blurry. How can I improve it?
blurry_text.answer:
To improve text clarity:
- Ensure adequate lighting
- Hold the camera steady
- Use the "Text Enhancement" option in the editing tools
- For important documents, consider using a higher scan quality setting

ocr_issues.question: I'm having trouble with the OCR feature. Any suggestions?
ocr_issues.answer:
For better OCR results:
- Ensure the document is well-lit and clearly visible
- Use the text enhancement feature before OCR
- For non-English text, make sure you've selected the correct language in settings
- Remember that OCR works best with typed text rather than handwriting

lost_scans.question: The app crashed and I lost my scans. Can I recover them?
lost_scans.answer: ScanPro creates temporary backups of recent scans. Try restarting the app to see if your scans appear in the "Recent" section. If not, check if you have automatic backups enabled and restore from your last backup.

data_security.question: Is my data secure in ScanPro?
data_security.answer:
Yes, ScanPro prioritizes your privacy and security:
- Documents are stored locally on your device by default
- Password-protected PDFs use strong encryption
- Cloud backups use secure connections
- We do not access or analyze the content of your documents

cloud_storage.question: Does ScanPro send my documents to the cloud?
cloud_storage.answer: ScanPro only sends your documents to cloud services when you explicitly choose to back up or share them. By default, all documents remain on your device.

sensitive_documents.question: How do I ensure maximum security for sensitive documents?
sensitive_documents.answer:
For sensitive documents, we recommend:
- Using the password protection feature
- Enabling biometric authentication in app settings
- Being selective about which documents you include in cloud backups
- Regularly checking which apps have access to your cloud storage services

change_language.question: How do I change the language in ScanPro?
change_language.answer:
To change the language:
1. Go to Settings
2. Tap "Language"
3. Select your preferred language from the list
4. The app will automatically restart with the new language

dark_mode.question: Can I use dark mode?
dark_mode.answer:
Yes, ScanPro supports both light and dark modes. You can:
1. Go to Settings > Appearance
2. Toggle "Dark Mode" on or off
3. Alternatively, set it to follow your system settings

biometric_auth.question: How do I enable biometric authentication?
biometric_auth.answer:
To enable biometric authentication:
1. Go to Settings > Security
2. Toggle "Biometric Authentication" on
3. Complete the authentication process as prompted by your device

getting_started.title: Getting Started with ScanPro
getting_started.intro: Welcome to ScanPro, your complete document scanning and management solution. This guide will help you get the most out of your app.

setup_steps.permissions: Grant camera and storage permissions when prompted to enable scanning and saving documents.
setup_steps.language: Choose your preferred language from the available options.
setup_steps.theme: Pick light or dark theme, which you can always change later in settings.

getting_started.home_screen_desc: The home screen is your command center for all ScanPro features:

features.recent_docs: Quickly access your most recently scanned or viewed documents.
features.scan_button: The large circular button at the bottom center starts a new scan.
features.folders: Organize your documents in custom folders for easy access.
features.search: Find any document by searching for names, content (if OCR was used), or tags.

getting_started.tip: You can customize your home screen layout in Settings → Appearance → Home Layout.

document_scanning.title: Document Scanning
document_scanning.intro: Scanning documents is the core function of ScanPro. The app provides multiple ways to capture high-quality document images.

scan_methods.home_button: Tap the scan button on the home screen
scan_methods.plus_button: Tap the + button and select 'Scan Document'
scan_methods.folder_scan: From a folder, tap the scan icon to add directly to that folder

modes.auto: The app automatically detects document edges and captures the image when steady.
modes.manual: You control when to capture the image with the capture button.
modes.batch: Continuously scan multiple pages for multi-page documents.

document_scanning.settings_desc: Before scanning, you can adjust various settings:

settings.color_mode: Choose between Color, Grayscale, or Black & White scanning.
settings.document_type: Select Document, Receipt, ID Card, or Photo for optimized processing.
settings.edge_detection: Enable or disable automatic edge detection.
settings.ocr: Enable to make text in your documents searchable.
settings.quality: Adjust the image quality (higher quality means larger file size).

document_scanning.tip: For best results, scan in a well-lit environment with the document placed on a contrasting background.

document_management.title: Document Management
document_management.intro: ScanPro makes it easy to manage your growing collection of documents.
document_management.library_desc: Your Document Library contains all scanned and imported documents. Here you can:

library_features.view: View all documents in a list or grid view
library_features.sort: Sort documents by name, date, size, or type
library_features.filter: Filter documents by type (PDF, image, etc.)

doc_actions.view: Open the document to read its contents.
doc_actions.edit: Modify the document's contents or appearance.
doc_actions.share: Send the document via email, messaging apps, etc.
doc_actions.move: Relocate the document to another folder.
doc_actions.favorite: Mark important documents for quick access.
doc_actions.delete: Remove the document from your library.

document_management.recents_desc: Access your most recent and favorite documents quickly from the home screen.
document_management.tip: You can perform batch operations by long-pressing a document to enter selection mode, then selecting multiple documents.

organization.title: Organization with Folders
organization.intro: Keep your documents organized using folders and subfolders in ScanPro.

creating_steps.step1: Tap the + button and select 'Create Folder'
creating_steps.step2: Enter a name for your folder
creating_steps.step4: Tap 'Create' to save your new folder

organization.subfolders_desc: ScanPro supports nested folders for hierarchical organization:

subfolder_features.create: Open a folder and tap + to create a subfolder within it
subfolder_features.content: Subfolders can contain both documents and additional subfolders
subfolder_features.navigate: Navigate up and down the folder structure using the breadcrumb navigation

moving_steps.step1: Long-press a document to select it

organization.managing_desc: You can manage your folders by:

folder_actions.rename: Change a folder's name, color, or icon.
folder_actions.delete: Remove a folder and optionally its contents.
folder_actions.move: Relocate a folder to become a subfolder of another folder.

organization.tip: Create folders based on document categories (e.g., Receipts, ID Documents, Work) or time periods (e.g., 2023, 2024).

editing.title: Editing & Enhancing Documents
editing.intro: ScanPro provides powerful tools to improve the quality and usefulness of your scanned documents.

enhancement_tools.auto: One-tap improvement for contrast and clarity.
enhancement_tools.brightness: Manual adjustment sliders for precise control.
enhancement_tools.color: Fix color issues or convert to grayscale/black & white.
enhancement_tools.noise: Remove specks and artifacts from scanned images.

editing_tools.ocr: Convert image text to editable digital text.
editing_tools.text: Modify recognized text directly in the app.
editing_tools.annotate: Add notes, highlights, or signatures to documents.

page_actions.add: Add new pages to existing documents
page_actions.extract: Extract pages to create new documents

editing.tip: For text-heavy documents, enable OCR during scanning or apply it later to make text searchable and editable.

pdf_tools.title: PDF Tools
pdf_tools.intro: ScanPro offers comprehensive PDF management capabilities.

creating_methods.scan: Convert scanned documents directly to PDF
creating_methods.combine: Combine multiple scans into a single PDF
creating_methods.images: Convert images from your gallery to PDF

pdf_tools.compression_desc: Reduce file size while maintaining quality:

compression_levels.low: Minimal compression, highest quality (90% of original size).
compression_levels.high: Maximum file size reduction (30-40% of original size).

pdf_tools.operations_desc: Manipulate PDF files with these tools:

pdf_operations.merge: Combine multiple PDF files into one document.
pdf_operations.split: Divide a PDF into multiple smaller documents.
pdf_operations.extract: Pull specific pages from a larger PDF.
pdf_operations.rearrange: Change the order of pages within a PDF.
pdf_operations.rotate: Correct the orientation of individual pages.

pdf_tools.tip: Use PDF compression when sharing large documents via email or messaging apps to avoid size limitations.

security.title: Document Security
security.intro: Protect your sensitive documents with ScanPro's security features.
security.app_security_desc: Secure access to the entire app:

app_security_features.biometric: Use fingerprint or face recognition to open the app.
app_security_features.pin: Set a numeric PIN code for app access.
app_security_features.auto_lock: Automatically lock the app after a period of inactivity.

security.encryption_desc: Add an extra layer of protection to individual documents:

encryption_features.change: Update passwords for already protected documents.
encryption_features.remove: Remove password encryption when no longer needed.

security.private_folder_desc: The Private Folder feature offers additional security for your most sensitive documents:

private_folder_features.auth: Documents in Private Folders require authentication to view
private_folder_features.hidden: Private Folders are hidden from the main document list
private_folder_features.biometric: Additional biometric verification before accessing Private Folders

security.practices_desc: Recommendations for keeping your documents secure:

security_practices.strong_passwords: Use strong, unique passwords for document protection
security_practices.biometric: Enable biometric authentication for convenient security
security_practices.sharing: Be cautious when sharing documents containing sensitive information

security.tip: Remember your document passwords! If you forget a PDF password, you won't be able to access the document contents.

import_export.title: Importing & Exporting
import_export.intro: ScanPro provides various options for bringing documents in and sharing them out.
import_export.importing_desc: Add existing documents to your library:

import_methods.gallery: Add photos from your device gallery.
import_methods.pdf: Add existing PDFs from your device storage.
import_methods.cloud: Import documents from Google Drive, Dropbox, etc.
import_methods.apps: Receive documents shared from other applications.

import_export.exporting_desc: Share your documents in various ways:

export_methods.images: Share individual pages as image files.
export_methods.options: Email, messaging apps, cloud storage, and more.

backup_methods.local: Save a backup to your device storage.
backup_methods.cloud: Back up to Google Drive or other cloud services.
backup_methods.auto: Schedule regular backups of your library.
backup_methods.restore: Recover your documents from a previous backup.

import_export.tip: Regular backups are essential for preventing data loss. Set up automatic backups in Settings → Backup & Restore.

settings.title: Settings & Preferences
settings.intro: Customize ScanPro to work just the way you want it.
settings.appearance_desc: Customize the app's look and feel:

appearance_settings.theme: Choose between Light, Dark, or System default theme.
appearance_settings.language: Select your preferred language from multiple options.
appearance_settings.layout: Customize which elements appear on your home screen.

scanning_settings.mode: Set your preferred scanning mode (Auto, Manual, Batch).
scanning_settings.color: Choose the default color processing (Color, Grayscale, B&W).
scanning_settings.enhancement: Enable automatic image enhancement for all scans.
scanning_settings.quality: Set the quality level for document scanning.

document_settings.location: Set where new documents are saved by default.
document_settings.quality: Set the default quality for PDF creation.

security_settings.pin: Create or change your app access PIN.
security_settings.auto_lock: Set how quickly the app locks after inactivity.

backup_settings.content: Select what data is included in backups.

settings.tip: Take some time to explore the Settings menu and customize ScanPro to match your workflow and preferences.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting & Support
troubleshooting.intro: Solutions for common issues and how to get help when needed.

scanning_solutions.quality: Ensure good lighting, keep the camera steady, and try using Auto Enhancement.
scanning_solutions.edges: Use a contrasting background, or switch to Manual mode and adjust crop manually.
scanning_solutions.ocr: Ensure the document is well-lit, clearly visible, and properly aligned.
scanning_solutions.camera: Check camera permissions in your device settings.

management_solutions.missing: Check different folders, use the search function, or restore from backup.
management_solutions.open: For password-protected PDFs, ensure you have the correct password.
management_solutions.performance: Try clearing the cache or restarting the app.
management_solutions.storage: Use the 'Clean Temporary Files' option in Settings, or compress large documents.

troubleshooting.support_desc: Ways to get help with ScanPro:

support_options.help: This User Guide and FAQ sections.
support_options.email: Contact our support team at support@scanpro.cc.
support_options.knowledge: Visit our website for additional resources.
support_options.feedback: Share your ideas and suggestions with our team.

troubleshooting.tip: When contacting support about an issue, include details about your device, app version, and steps to reproduce the problem.
